title: A Shrekening, Hero “Bonus” 5.18.20
itunes:title: A Shrekening, Hero “Bonus” 5.18.20
description:
In episode 632, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian and Natch Beaut host Jackie Johnson to discuss Joe Biden's recent gaffes, the NBA possibly coming back, Kroger being shady, and then a discussion of Sleepless, Shrek: The Musical, and The Wrong Missy, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. IN ANOTHER BIDEN GAFFE, FORMER VP SAYS PANDEMIC COST U.S. 85,000 JOBS AND 'MILLIONS' OF LIVES
  2. Can the N.B.A. Come Back, and Stay Back?
  3. Report: Michael Jordan Agreed to Release 1997-98 Bulls Footage During 2016 Cavaliers Championship Parade
  4. Kroger Pays CEO $21 Million After Ending Store Workers' 'Hero Bonus'
  5. Orchestrating an Ogre’s Monster Makeover
  6. Smash Mouth Booking Agency Profile
  7. "Shrek" a family musical with gay-pride element
  8. Shrek: The Musical drops 'dehumanising' transphobic slur
  9. ‘Shrek The Musical’ coming to L.A. with a lighter tone of green
  10. Shrek the Musical
  11. Drop the curtain, it’s ogre
  12. WATCH: Four Tet - Twenty Three

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
